divs: Sighting Detailsnoticed star through living room window,noticed was moving,stayed stationary but at times would drift up or down then go back,noticed no other stars due to high clouds,turned off tv and watched for over one hour in diffrent locations of house.seemed to emit quick red beam of light for split second at times as moved then would be still for a few miniutes,i was looking south east from shreveport la,object was about 10 oclock high on horizen.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
There were no other sightings in Shreveport on or around February 7th 2009
Summary: Star like, hovers, moves slowly, red/white flash.
